OpenSim::MarkerSet

MarkerSet Class Reference

#include <MarkerSet.h>

Inheritance diagram for MarkerSet:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class for holding a set of markers for inverse kinematics.

Authors:
Ayman Habib, Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
